videos.headline: Woodson finds Coney for Zips TD
videos.description: Akron capitalizes on turnover with quick score from A.J. Coney.

videos.headline: BGSU WR passes it to QB on trick play
videos.description: Bowling Green WR Matthew Wilcox Jr.  finds Jarret Doege down the sideline on trick play.

videos.headline: Domer punches it in for BGSU
videos.description: Matt Domer finishes off BGSU drive with a short touchdown run.

videos.headline: Woodson airs it out to Wolf for Akron TD
videos.description: Austin Wolf pulls down the 43-yard touchdown to extend the Akron lead.

videos.headline: Edwards scores from 3 yards out
videos.description: Van Edwards Jr. punches it in for a three-yard touchdown for the Zips.

videos.headline: BGSU shows off razzle-dazzle for TD
videos.description: James Morgan receives the pitch back and airs it out to Hunter Folkertsma for the touchdown.

videos.headline: Morgan finds Clair for the 26-yard score
videos.description: BGSU ties the game with a 26-yard touchdown from James Morgan to Andrew Clair.

videos.headline: Woodson keeps it  for the 11-yard TD
videos.description: Thomas Woodson finishes off touchdown run for Akron with a dive in the end zone.

videos.headline: Brown gets a pick-six for the Zips
videos.description: Janes Morgan's pass is picked off by Kyron Brown for the 38-yard touchdown.
